series_name.series_title: International Conference on Computer Graphics and Interactive Techniques

abstract.par:
In 2013, SIGGRAPH's Computer Animation Festival celebrates its 40th year as the world's leading festival of the most innovative and accomplished computer graphics. An internationally recognized jury receives hundreds of submissions and presents outstanding achievements through four different programs running over four-days.

The SIGGRAPH 2013 Computer Animation Festival presents:

Electronic Theater: Showing Monday through Thursday, the Electronic Theater showcases an eclectic mix of the finest work in computer graphics from the last 12 months.

Daytime Selects: The most creative, innovative, and aesthetic computer graphics presented by submission category, including: Animated Shorts, Visual Effects, Real-Time Graphics, Music Videos, Commercials, and Visualization.

Production Sessions: Learn how world-class creative and production talent created the computer animation and visual effects in some of the Computer Animation Festival's most provocative works.

Real-Time Live!: Live presentations reviewing the year's most innovative real-time graphics, celebrating interactive rendering techniques across all fields and hardware platforms.

sponsor.sponsor_name: ACM Special Interest Group on Computer Graphics and Interactive Techniques

abstract.par: The Japan Media Arts Festival is a comprehensive festival of Media Arts (Media Geijyutsu) that honors outstanding works in a diverse range of media, from animation and comics to media art and games.

MPC helped Channel 4 launch its big new catch-up station - 4/7. The idents continues Channel 4's play on perspective and involved a bespoke VFX approach. The right-angled effect was produced using an innovative mix of angled camera work and CG augmentation, with mind-bendingly effective results.
It's an afternoon in Versailles, during the reign of Louis XIV.

In the train top battle scenes, the fact that the action takes place at night presented specific challenges to the 3D artists and compositors because believable lighting was of utmost importance. Another key challenge was the construction and destruction animation of the massive wooden trestle bridge.
Winner of the Tokyo Demo Fest 2013 competition.

It is the time of the American War of Independence. A bald eagle looks on as heavily outnumbered patriots are massacred by British troops. Enter Connor, warrior son of a Native American mother and British father, who single-handedly ignites the revolution and changes the course of history forever.

abstract.par: A small group of cruise-ship revellers find themselves alone on a tropical island. Forced inland, their exploration reveals the mystery that lies at its heart.
This movie tells us the story of an Opéra Garnier ballet, from the opening scene to the final curtain.
In the city of Bet She'an where mankind is progressively morphing into crows, a sculptor decides to leave a trace of this dwindling humanity.

It is just another evening commute until the rain starts to fall, and the city comes alive to the sound of dripping rain pipes, whistling awnings, and gurgling gutters. In this drizzly scenario, two umbrellas - one blue, one not - fall eternally in love.
Inspired by the classic shorts from the golden age of cartoons, this brief episode uses a simple theme to create an entertaining story for all ages.

Dracula walks the corridors of his dark castle. He takes a moment to remember loved ones he has lost, then unleashes all his wrath upon an enemy army. They are no match for him, as he displays full ownership of his vampire powers. Then a familiar stranger enters the battlefield.

abstract.par: Since the 1970's scientists, have conducted experiments with bizarre amusement rides to study their effects on the human brain. Appropriating the aesthetics of a television documentary, this short film takes a tongue-in-cheek look at humanity's confused search for solutions.

article_rec.title: Cloud atlas
article_rec.subtitle: the worlds of Sonmi and Zachry

abstract.par: As the lead VFX vendor, Method Studios produced numerous VFX-heavy sequences, including fully CG establishing shots of the futuristic city, Neo Seoul, along with dynamic escape sequences, the "Orison" hologram device, various CG vehicles, and digital facial makeup work on Chang.

article_rec.title: Cloudy with a Chance of Meatballs 2

abstract.par: "Cloudy With a Chance of Meatballs 2" picks up where Sony Pictures Animation's hit comedy left off. When Flint Lockwood discovers that his most infamous machine is still operating and is now creating food-animal hybrids -- "foodimals!" -- he and his friends embark on a dangerously delicious mission.
"Liquid Dream" plunges the audience into a stream of effervescent Coke Zero, gliding in and out of liquid and light and interacting with golden light beams against a glowing, star-filled galaxy.

au.affiliation: Ogilvy & Mather Paris/BUF/LEGEND3D for The Coca-Cola Company, France

abstract.par: In a long-submerged city, a man obsessed by the passing of time waits for the one moment each year when the waters subside.

The film is the first announcement of a new computer game, Cyberpunk 2077. The game is based on the system of Cyberpunk 2020, an American RPG game written by Mike Pondsmith in the 1890s. This very short, poster-like teaser includes music performed by Archive.

abstract.par: A real-time motion graphics experiment.

abstract.par: Reinforcing their position as the leader in character animation, MPC introduces "Thomas", a photo-real VFX-fuelled spot for Dell that reveals the transformative power of imagination. MPC took special care in CG character development to define the personalities of all anthropomorphic characters, giving them life-like qualities and vitality.

MPC took special care in CG character development to define the personalities of all anthropomorphic characters, giving them life-like qualities and vitality. article_rec.title: Disintegration by monarchy ft. Dita von Teese

abstract.par: Gravity Visual Effects and Design brings the CG and VFX to this off-kilter, soft-core dystopia created by director Roy Raz for Dita Von Teese and the London electro-pop duo Monarchy.

Econews is an Ident for an enviromental television show for a Greek TV channel. The client wanted a concept that would reinforce the enviromental brand of the show. They expected photoreal and detailed motion work that maintains a visual consistency with the channel's brand visuals.

AKQA, Bethesda and Zenimax Online Studios charged Blur with bringing the award-winning and expansive warring world of The Elder Scrolls online to fans worldwide. The epic trailer showcases the unrelenting intensity of the Ebonheart, Daggerfall, and Aldmeri Dominion's warriors as they race to claim Cyrodiil as their prize.

abstract.par: The story is a sequel of a famous Japanese story, "Night on the Galactic Railroad". Giovanni is hoping to see his best friend Campanella once again, as he plays Campanella's song on the day he died.
Second place in the 64k intro competition at Revision 2012.
Octave, a young businessman, nurtures a clandestine passion for betting games that trap him in a deep addiction.
Putting fun into funerals! A student-directed team production, this animated short is a mock commercial for a funeral parlour that offers alternative options for sending off your loved ones.
A commercial for Gemdale Lake City, a large residential project located in Xi'an. The major techniques applied in the film are multiple applications of 3D, sketching, watercolor, and oil painting.
A commercial for Gemdale Lake City, a large residential project located in Xi'an. Application of 3D techniques creates a highly realistic virtual scene and heightens the twinkling atmosphere.
This commercial for a residential project features a clever mixture of live-action and 3D simulation with a seamless shot that illustrates a meaningful life.

In an alternate future, cities grow into the earth, leaving the skies clear for flying machines. A new hydrogen based energy source, combined with underground highways beneath the buildings, allow for a pollution free surface level, more freely enjoyed by pedestrians.

fulltext.ft_body: GRAN VIA Visual Effects contact Javier Romero Ilion Animation Studios javier.romero@ilion.com www.ilion.com Spain In an alternate future, cities grow into the earth, leaving the skies clear for flying machines. abstract.par: "The Commissioning" introduces the storyline behind the new X-Box game released in 2012. Method Studios was keen to deliver the immersive Halo gaming experience and produce visuals that feel as exciting as the latest blockbuster movies.

Dr. Catherine E. Halsey is in shackles, being interrogated by an ONI agent. Seemingly, the agent is just trying to establish her guilt regarding her role in the Spartan-II Program: turning children into soldiers. But as Halsey soon finds out, his intentions are far more complex.

abstract.par: The catamaran Hamayuri was carried onto an inn roof by the Great East Japan Earthquake tsunami. Some wanted to leave it as a reminder, but it was taken down for fear of secondary damage. This project filmed the Hamayuri from various directions and reproduced its three-dimensional shape using image-based modeling.
Harald is a wrestler. Driven by his ambitious mother, he wins a vast number of challenge cups. But his true love is flowers. When his mother takes away his favorite flower, he has to fight for it.

As Hermit the Crab wanders around on his reef, his shell gets stuck. After he escapes his shell and exposes his bare bottom, he uses absurd techniques to free the shell. When he succeeds, he is captured by a seagull.

The fantastical creatures and epic lands of Middle-earth are a stunning showcase for the creativity and innovation that has become the standard for Weta Digital. See how some of the most memorable moments of the film came together: the gloriously disgusting Goblin King, the rebuilding of Gollum from the inside out, Trolls, Eagles, Azog, breathtaking Rivendell, the fully CG Goblin Caverns, and more.
A worker in a pickle factory sometimes loses parts of his body.

au.affiliation: L'Institut Supérieur des Arts Appliques, France

abstract.par: What tripped the god and goddess over the cloud? On the road full of tall buildings, no one paid attention to a small temple. The temple was deteriorating, but it was remade by the gods in order to make it shine again.
The visual effects of "Star Trek Into Darkness".

Traditional cultures are gradually transformed with time. Even though human beliefs still exist, they have been transformed to preserve and pass on the cultures. This creation focuses on how humans try their best to keep their beliefs from being swallowed up by time.

au.affiliation: Tainan National University of the Arts, Taiwan

abstract.par: A young woman is followed by a crocodile who represents her shyness. As he makes her life a living hell, she tries everything to get rid of him.
A poetic flight over amazing landscapes that disturbs our bearings.

Tony Stark and Colonel Rhodes engage Killian and his mercenaries in a fiery aerial encounter aided by 32 new suits designed specifically for "Iron Man 3". Weta Digital built a fully CG seaport environment and carefully choreographed the background fighting to amplify the tension and the impact of this final showdown. Developing a realistic Extremis effect, creating eight signature suit-connect moments, and integrating digital doubles, a number of all-CG shots, and the massive crane destruction were all integral to Weta Digital's work on the film.

Method Studios delivered the polished, futuristic effects needed to bring the Hotbots to life. After successful CG skin tests, it was determined that only the live-action heads and dresses of the models would be retained, and the arms, chest, and legs would be entirely replaced.

Ad agency David&Goliath and director Jake Scott asked Method Studios to create all-encompassing effects for the biggest advertising venue in the world: the Super Bowl. This spot, filled with fully CG animals and environments was the most VFX-heavy commercial produced for the game.

fulltext.ft_body: Kia Space Babies Advertising contact Melissa Knight Method Studios melissa.knight@methodstudios.com www.methodstudios.com United States Ad agency David&Goliath and director Jake Scott asked Method Studios to create all-encompassing effects for the big­gest advertising venue in the world: the Super Bowl. This spot, filled with fully CG animals and environments was the most VFX-heavy commercial produced for the game. abstract.par: Under a leaden sky, a utopian empire is overthrown by a malefic foreign horde. In the aftermath, a regal bother and sister are separated and desperately struggle to reunite.

fulltext.ft_body: King and Lionheart Music Videos Electronic Theater contact Mihai Wilson We Were Monkeys mihai@weweremonkeys.com Canada Under a leaden sky, a utopian empire is overthrown by a malefic foreign horde. In the aftermath, a regal bother and sister are separated and desperately struggle to reunite. abstract.par: A small dragon lives to see a very special night in the dinosaur museum.

A short story about an encounter in an abstract world, stylized as the paintings of Giorgio De Chrico. A Man is going to meet A Woman in abstract flying city. He is climbing up on the buildings like a parkour practitioner. One unguarded moment is enough to make him lose his senses. And his chance.

article_rec.title: Love in the time of advertising

abstract.par: An animated musical love story about a young man who lives inside a billboard, where he updates the advertisements. When he falls in love with a beautiful lady living across the highway, he has to use the only method he knows to get his message across: advertising.

fulltext.ft_body: Love In The Time Of Advertising Shorts & Features Electronic Theater contact Kevin Shapiro Wolf & Crow info@loveinthetimeofadvertising.com www.wolfandcrow.com United States An animated musical love story about a young man who lives inside a billboard, where he updates the advertisements. When he falls in love with a beautiful lady living across the highway, he has to use the only method he knows to get his message across: advertising. Created By Matt Berenty David Bokser Director David Bokser Producer Kevin Shapiro Matt Berenty David Bokser Production Coordinators Kelly Shay Krissy Estrada Music Composition Hunter Curra Sound FX Editing Hunter Curra Narrator/Voice of Henry Hunter Curra Voice of Sally Jillinda Palmer Re-Recording Mixer Michael Jesmer Post Production Audio Services Margarita Mix Hollywood Character Design Britt Spencer Concept Art Ram Bhat Su Jung Mary Poplin Additional Concept Art by David Boudreau Kacey Schwartz Matte Paintings Ram Bhat Storyboards Sue Bielenberg Billboard Design Joanna Davidovich Jiyun Ha Jacqueline Jocson Jaime Leake Britt Spencer Credit Design Jamie Leake Animation Supervisor David Bokser Layout David Bokser Josh Burton Lindsey Butterworth Animation David Bokser Josh Burton Christine Phelan Adam Lawthers Nick Dubois Additional Animation Maeve Curran Aradhana Modi Lindsey Butterworth Yvain Gnabro Adam Chaput Heather Shrewsbury Effects Animation Kiel Gnebba David Glicksmann David Bokser Scene Setup Joe Grossmann David Bokser Technical Director David Bokser Cloth and Hair Simulation David Bokser James Marcus Tyler Lancaster CG Supervisor Matt Berenty Modeling Matt Berenty Joe Grossmann Wendy Klein Mike DuPree David Alston Nesi Papoushado Richard Daniels Additional Modeling Paul Lohman Martin Knapp Polet Harutnian Shading and Texture Matt Berenty Wendy Klein Richard Daniels Phina Kahng Lighting Matt Berenty Katie Yoon Joe Grossmann Richard Daniels Phina Kahng Wendy Klein Hao Cui Compositing Travis Button Editing David Bokser Special Thanks Mom & Dad Maeve Curran John Doublestein Chad Howitt Tracy James Love In The Time Of Advertising Shorts & Features Electronic Theater contact Kevin Shapiro Wolf & Crow info@loveinthetimeofadvertising.com www.wolfandcrow.com United States

article_rec.title: Making of Disintegration by Monarchy ft. Diva von Teese

abstract.par: Gravity brings the CG and VFX to this off-kilter, soft-core dystopia created by director Roy Raz for Dita Von Teese and the London electro-pop duo Monarchy. Possibly the first use of a mosquito (3D or otherwise) as sexual innuendo.

The Krypton in "Man of Steel" is like no other we've seen before. Drawing on organic shapes for inspiration, Weta Digital brought the strictly non-linear, non-symmetrical cities, ships, and landscapes to life. Weta Digital also developed the visualization technology used in the ship communications system and the history of Krypton. The system utilizes organic liquid-metal beads that dynamically morph into detailed animations. Closing out this action packed reel are the dramatic "space ballet" battle sequences and the incredible destruction of Krypton.

From Warner Bros. and Legendary Pictures comes "Man of Steel", a new take on Superman's origin story. The American superhero movie directed by Zack Snyder shows young Clark Kent questioning his purpose in life until he has to use his secret superpowers to defend the greater good, thus becoming Superman.

Loneliness. A falling feather triggers a fantasy for a lonely character, sitting on a floating island. At first, his fantasy is naive and easy, but it soon becomes too much, and the character wants out.
Created as an album teaser for The M Machine's 2013 release Metropolis Pt. II. A powerful burst of a cinematic journey through a dark city full of gorgeous, surreal mystery.
This commercial for Midea's well-known appliances features visual effects based on hydrodynamic simulation and performance to illustrate the fluid transformation of Midea's major products.
Winner of the Euskal Encounters 2012 demo competition.

While walking through a tropical forest, Ea, a semi-humanoid of semi-technical origin, discovers a strange plant that encloses a human embryo. As she touches the plant, Ea experiences a vision. The embryo develops into Enki, an insatiable monster that destroys the entire world.

fulltext.ft_body: Natalis Student Films contact Daniel Brkovic and Jan-Marcel Kuehn Filmakademie Baden-Württemberg festival@animationsinstitut.de www.animationsinstitut.de Germany While walking through a tropical forest, Ea, a semi-humanoid of semi-technical origin, discovers a strange plant that encloses a human embryo. As she touches the plant, Ea experiences a vi­sion. The embryo develops into Enki, an insatiable monster that destroys the entire world. abstract.par: This ad for Nike+ comprises 70 shots, 67 involving major VFX. It was an intense project, including an extensive range of VFX creatd by artists working in four global locations. The ad is a remarkable example of what can be achieved with talent, cutting-edge technology, and carefully planned live action.

An attempt to create huge beautiful natural scenes with a scenery generator. Fog and haze, a feeling of scale feeling, and water transparency were used to produce a vision of the real world. Where is this character going?
A man who is always on the move has an encounter that calls into question everything he knows.

How exposed and public can your thoughts become before the situation becomes embarrassing? Which dirty thoughts could get you into trouble? That's Hubert's problem. Anyone can clearly read his thoughts in a speech balloon floating above his head. Watch his challenging search for a girlfriend.
Once upon a time, there was a little king who lost control of the sun.

When Oscar Diggs, a circus magician with dubious ethics, is hurled away to the Land of Oz, he thinks he's hit the jackpot. Drawn into epic problems with Oz and its inhabitants, Diggs must decide who is good and who is evil before it's too late.

This commercial about a residential project continues the unique creative pursuit of Dans Digital. The spot includes a large volume of visual effects, which strengthen its visual impact and viewing enjoyment.
In a vast empty space, the sun rises, and moving light and shadows reveal a strange sculpture.

Prepare for one helluva ride as Blur teams up with Sony Online Entertainment to bring to life a never-ending, grueling, grind-it-out-battle fought by thousands. On Auraxis, on the battlefield, let your guard down for even a moment, and it's all over.

fulltext.ft_body: PlanetSide 2: Death is No Excuse Games contact Dave Wilson Blur Studio dwilson@blur.com www.blur.com United States Prepare for one helluva ride as Blur teams up with Sony Online Entertainment to bring to life a never-ending, grueling, grind-it-out-battle fought by thousands. On Auraxis, on the battlefield, let your guard down for even a moment, and it's all over. abstract.par: With "Prometheus", Ridley Scott, director of "Alien" and "Blade Runner", returns to the genre he helped define.
Winner of DiHALT 2012 64k intro competition.
In the wake of a machine uprising, an alien commander is interrogated by his captor.
Barney lives with his father, Walter, in a little suburban house. He tries to live a normal life even though Barney is different: his sense of gravity is inverted.
The balloon animals of the Serengeti are struggling to follow their daily routine.
Based on a true story set in 17th-century Latvia, "The Rose of Turaida" tells of the tragedy of a beautiful young woman who makes the ultimate sacrifice for love and honour.
Third in the Wild competition at Assembly 2012. Runs on Android.
Even robots get bored in deadend jobs, until they realize they are about to be replaced by humans! This clever comedy was shot in one day with actors replaced by animated robots.

"SideKick" is a short film about a farmer, Utth, who lives in the middle of nowhere. When he runs out of gas, he must rely on an unlikely partnership with a carrot-loving donkey to get him to the market on time.

au.affiliation: Academy of Art University San Francisco

fulltext.ft_body: SideKick Student Films contact Amrinder Singh Jassar Academy of Art University San Francisco frameanimator@gmail.com United States SideKick is a short film about a farmer, Utth, who lives in the middle of nowhere. When he runs out of gas, he must rely on an unlikely partnership with a carrot-loving donkey to get him to the market on time. abstract.par: This metaphor for experiences that are larger than life explores the phenomenal childhood moments that are ultimately dependent on one's own perspective.

Peña Brian Smith Kelly Kin Siran Liu Jared Wright Jay Jackson Matte Painters R.J. Peña Rachel Cunningham Brian Smith Siran Liu Pipeline Brandon Jarratt Garrett Broussard Sarah Spofford

abstract.par: The spectacular opening sequence to herald the BBC's coverage of the London 2012 Olympic Games is based on the concept of "Stadium UK", bringing the nation together to participate in the Olympic coverage.

article_rec.title: StarCraft II
article_rec.subtitle: Heart of the Swarm cinematic intro

abstract.par: "Swarm", the intro cinematic for StarCraft II: Heart of the Swarm, reveals the wrath of the Queen of Blades and her Zerg swarm as they raze the Terran Dominion capital world of Korhal. But is this a memory of things past or a premonition of events to come?

Three generations of a single family live together under a common roof in an uncoordinated choreography. The mother, acting as an orchestra conductor, tries without success to gather everyone around the same table for dinner.

In a world of roaming steel beasts, it's a fight to the finish. Survival is the only goal. These four-legged monsters have evolved to their maximum potential. Who will reign over this wild world? Simply evolving is not enough to ensure survival.

Oscar-winning director Chris Landreth plays Charles, a man paralyzed by his inability to remember a friend's name. Thus begins a mind-bending romp through a game show of the unconscious, complete with animated celebrity guests.

au.affiliation: National Film Board of Canada, Canada

abstract.par: Square is a deconstruction of the fractal structure of urban landscapes.

Mann vs. Machine is a new co-operative game for Team Fortress 2 that lets you and five friends wage a desperate battle to stop a lethal horde of robots from deploying a bomb in one of Mann Co.'s many strongholds.
This animation uses image-based lighting and radiance environment maps made from a series of time-lapse movies. The illumination changes over time.

Directed by Sam Mason and Pete Candeland, "Hum" is set to a catchy song that carries us on a journey through a charming miniature-style landscape to demonstrate the versatility of the Toyota Prius Hybrid and the lifestyles of various owners.
Second place in the Assembly 2012 4k intro competition, despite being only 1k.
Second in the demo competition at Payback 2013.
A little cat witnesses the passing of his family.

article_rec.title: Trouble on the green (panade sur le green)

abstract.par: In a little French town, a minigolf tournament is organized each year. But this year, the news announces the end of the world.
Second place in the demo competition at Evoke 2012.

"Warm Bodies," a new genre of film (zombie romantic comedy), featured extensive character animation of the "Boneys", a completely digital city, and great use of digital set extensions. All effects were produced by LOOK Effects in Vancouver.

article_rec.title: Wolf children
article_rec.subtitle: Ookami Kodomo no Ame to Yuki

abstract.par: Three years after the world-famous animation film "Summer Wars", Mamoru Hosoda releases his next original animation, "Wolf Children".

The mist-shrouded continent of Pandaria is revealed along with its impressive inhabitants, the Pandaren. Two bitter enemies, sole survivors of a battle at sea, find themselves washed ashore in a strange new land. Their old conflict resumes until the Pandaren known as Chen Stormstout shows them another way.

Method Studios was tasked with a main VFX sequence involving the awakening of the rock giant Kronos. The CG monster is brought to life and causes the destruction of the Underworld. Digital doubles were created and composited into fully CG environments along with fire, smoke, explosions, and flowing lava.
This ad presents the universe of ZombiU, a first-person shooter survival horror video game from Ubisoft Montpellier soon to be released exclusively for the Nintendo's Wii U console.

article_rec.title: Adding more life to your characters with TressFX

abstract.par: For many years, video game developers have been striving to realize fully simulated and rendered hair at interactive frame rates. This presentation focuses on how Crystal Dynamics, with support from AMD, crafted one of the first real-time, GPU-driven hair solutions for games.

Butterfly Effect is a real-time-rendered short developed in a collaboration among Unity Technologies, Passion Pictures, and NVIDIA. During development, many traditional offline CG techniques were adopted for real-time rendering: physically based shading, Catmull-Clark subdivision, texture-space diffusion for subsurface scattering, pyroclastic noise-based volumetric effects, etc.

Video performance capture drives a facial blendshape model made from high-resolution facial scans, compressed and realistically rendered in a reproducible game-ready pipeline designed for current-generation PCs and next-generation consoles.

In contrast to pre-fracturing techniques used in games today, this new method for fracturing 3D models in real time breaks objects dynamically depending on the impact location. The demonstration simulates destruction of a large arena by user-guided meteors.

Phil Taylor (Founder of CAT and Founder/CTO at Fabric Engine Inc.) presents Creation: Horde, a real-time crowd system that scales from individual agents to very large crowds of complex characters. Horde provides a paint-based system for interactive control of crowds.

Shadertoy allows developers to live-code procedural shaders that react to music, videos, and webcams using HTML5 and WebGL. These creations are shared with the community, making Shadertoy a great repository for finding inspiration, learning, and teaching about shading, reactivity, and rendering.

article_rec.title: Slice:drop
article_rec.subtitle: collaborative medical imaging in the browser

abstract.par: This project demonstrates real-time rendering and sharing of standard medical data formats between WebGL-enabled browsers across multiple devices. Any linked browser can interact with and update the display, which propogates to all other linked browsers.

J-Walt Adamczyk pushes the envelope of animation and visual creation as a performing art with new physical and software interfaces. At SIGGRAPH 2013, he performs a new piece in which he creates and explores an improvised 3D world, taking the audience on an immersive visual-musical odyssey.

Explore the details of a realtime demo-scene animation using a LEAP controller: You can use one finger to easily navigate the camera inside a running animation and adjust the parameters of underlying mandel-box fractal with the 2nd finger. The project was made with our custom software Tooll2.

Epic Games' Unreal Engine 4 Infiltrator real-time demonstration presents high-end rendering features, including physically based materials and lighting, full-scene HDR reflections, advanced GPU particle simulation, adaptive detail with artist-programmable tessellation and displacement, dynamically lit particles that emit and receive light, and thousands of dynamic lights with tiled deferred shading.
